## Options interface

Plugin constructor options

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Options
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                     | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Description                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [criticalOptions?](/api/critical-css-webpack-plugin/options/criticaloptions) | { src?: string; html?: string; base?: string; width?: number; height?: number; extract?: boolean; ignore?: { atrule: string\[\]; rule: RegExp\[\]; decl: (node: any, value: any) =&gt; boolean; }; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Critical CSS options                               |
